title: About Us Team Extractor
description: Find a company website's About/Team/Leadership page and extract names, job titles, and emails.

startUrls.title: Company websites
startUrls.description: List of company homepages or domains to process.

maxCompanies.title: Max companies
maxCompanies.description: Hard limit for how many input websites will be processed.

maxTeamPageCandidates.title: Max team page candidates
maxTeamPageCandidates.description: How many About/Team/Leadership page candidates to try per company (from homepage links and common paths).

roleIncludeKeywords.title: Role include keywords
roleIncludeKeywords.description: If set, only output people whose title contains at least one keyword (case-insensitive). Example: ["Founder", "CEO"].

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to process in parallel.

tryExpandMenus.title: Try expand menus
tryExpandMenus.description: Best-effort attempt to open hamburger/menu navigation on the homepage before ranking links.

useSitemapFallback.title: Use sitemap fallback
useSitemapFallback.description: If homepage discovery yields too few candidates, try robots.txt + sitemap.xml to find team/about URLs.

useDepth2Discovery.title: Use depth-2 discovery
useDepth2Discovery.description: If we can't find a good Team/Leadership page directly, also try: homepage -> about/company -> team/leadership.

maxDiscoveryPagesPerCompany.title: Max discovery pages per company
maxDiscoveryPagesPerCompany.description: Max number of intermediate About/Company pages to try per company when using depth-2 discovery.

useLlm.title: Use LLM fallback (OpenAI)
useLlm.description: If enabled, uses OpenAI to extract people when heuristic extraction finds no people on a candidate page.

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API key
openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key. Prefer using Actor secrets in production.

openaiModel.title: OpenAI model
openaiModel.description: Model name for the OpenAI call (e.g. gpt-4o-mini).

llmMaxChars.title: LLM max chars
llmMaxChars.description: Maximum number of characters of HTML/text sent to the LLM.
